titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Third Presbyterian Church records 1991.057
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:13:42 +0000.

did.abstract: These records include documents of the Board of Trustees, and minutes of meetings of the Third Presbyterian Church and its congregation. The records span the period 1838 to 1857 and are housed in a single bound volume.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Third Presbyterian Church records, 1991.057, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The records were formally accessioned in 1991.

controlaccess.subject: Presbyterian Church |z New York (State) |z Kings County
